Are you looking for some high-speed, drifting action? Drift King is an exciting, high-speed racing game that has just one rule: Drift as fast as you can! Show off your drifting skills in this captivating iPad game. The longer your car stays in the controlled drift, the more points you will make. Become a real drift king!

Are you the real king of speedway? Drift king is a high-speed drifting game in which you are driving a sports car and participating in an exciting drift race on the different highways, tracks of the city. Control your car with the arrow keys and unlock the new exciting levels. Good luck!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Adorable graphic style
Individual graphics and sound settings
Simple controls
Exciting levels
Several camera angles
